page.title: 09Family Life in 1985
page.content: Mr and Mrs Spiers are a young couple who live on a council estate in our area. They have lived there for three years,and are both out of work. Mr Spiers worked in a cinema until it closed down. Mrs Spiers has a seven month baby, (Katherine). Mrs Spiers has some hobbies, walking, swimming, she never gets bored, because she looks after the baby all the time. Mr and Mrs Spiers sometimes goes to the sea, they have a car. When Mrs Spiers was a little girl she lived in Lancashire, she did not go to college. Before they both came to Richmond they both lived in a flat. They do not have any pets but they would like a cat. If Mrs Spiers had five minutes extra she would do some knitting. At Christmas they will eat and drink and enjoy themselves.
